Description.Text: Other amenities/services:apartments and maisonettes fully equipped and carefully designed with air condition, kitchen, refrigerator, telephone and internet capabilities, safe box, satellite TV, shower or bath W.C. and balcony or veranta.

Important place or monument close to the hotel:situated in the heart of Malia 1 km away from the next beach, central but quiet between Agios Nikolaos and the capital city of Heraklion. Its only a 35 km drive from the international airport.
